languages.text: "Если вы желаете стать свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} странного поведения сервиторов прежде, чем распорядиться о их судьбе — я могу это устроить. Большая часть дефективных единиц была собрана вместе в одном из грузовых залов в ожидании вашего приказа".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы желаете стать свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} странного поведения сервиторов прежде, чем распорядиться о их судьбе — я могу это устроить. Большая часть дефективных единиц была собрана вместе в одном из грузовых залов в ожидании вашего приказа".

languages.text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."
languages.original_text: "Если вы желаете стать свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} странного поведения сервиторов прежде, чем распорядиться о их судьбе — я могу это устроить. Большая часть дефективных единиц была собрана вместе в одном из грузовых залов в ожидании вашего приказа".

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments. They are waiting for your decision."

"If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments. They are waiting for your decision."

"If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments. They are waiting for your decision."

"If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments. They are waiting for your decision."

"If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

"If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr das ungewöhnliche Verhalten der Servitoren begutachten möchtet, bevor Ihr über sie entscheidet, kann ich das veranlassen. Der Großteil der defekten Einheiten wurde in eine der Lagerabteilungen gebracht, bis Ihr eine Entscheidung trefft."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr das ungewöhnliche Verhalten der Servitoren begutachten möchtet, bevor Ihr über sie entscheidet, kann ich das veranlassen. Der Großteil der defekten Einheiten wurde in eine der Lagerabteilungen gebracht. Sie warten auf Eure Entscheidung."

languages.text: « Si vous préférez constater ce comportement inhabituel des servitors par vous-même avant de statuer sur leur sort, c'est tout à fait possible. La majorité des unités défectueuses se trouvent actuellement dans l'un des compartiments de stockage et n'attendent plus que votre sentence. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous préférez constater ce comportement inhabituel des servitors par vous-même avant de statuer sur leur sort, c'est tout à fait possible. La majorité des unités défectueuses se trouvent actuellement dans l'un des compartiments de stockage et n'attendent plus que votre sentence. »

languages.text: “如果您希望处理那些机仆之前，先仔细观察一下他们的异常行为，我们可以为您进行安排。绝大部分有缺陷的机仆已经送到了储藏室里，它们的命运完全听候您的发落。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: “如果您希望处理那些奴工之前，先仔细观察一下他们的异常行为，我们可以为您进行安排。绝大部分有缺陷的奴工已经送到了储藏室里，它们的命运完全听候您的发落。”

languages.text: 「ご決断の前にサーヴィターの異常行動をご覧になりたいのなら、そのように手配いたします。故障したユニットの大半は、貯蔵区画の一つに運んでおり、あなた様のご決断次第でございます」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: 「ご決断の前にサーヴィターの異常行動をご覧になりたいのなら、そのように手配いたします。故障したユニットの大半は、貯蔵区画の一つに運んでおります。あなたのご決断次第でございます」

languages.text: «Si desea observar el comportamiento inusual de los servidores antes de decidir qué hacer con ellos, no habría problema alguno. Han llevado la mayoría de las unidades defectuosas a uno de los compartimentos de almacenamiento, a la espera de su decisión».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: «Si desea observar el comportamiento inusual de los servidores antes de decidir qué hacer con ellos, no habría problema alguno. Han llevado la mayoría de las unidades defectuosas a uno de los compartimentos de almacenamiento. Están esperando su decisión».

languages.text: "Kaderlerine karar vermeden önce bu olağan dışı davranışlarını gözlemlemek isterseniz tertip edebiliriz. Arızalı birimlerin çoğu, kararınızı beklemek üzere depolama kompartımanlarına gönderildi."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to observe the servitors' unusual behaviour before you decide their fate, this can be arranged. The majority of the defective units have been delivered to one of the storage compartments pending your decision."

traits.locale_text: "Kaderlerine karar vermeden önce bu olağan dışı davranışlarını gözlemlemek isterseniz tertip edebiliriz. Arızalı birimlerin çoğu, kararınızı beklemek üzere depolama kompartımanlarına gönderildi."
